thread.title: Has David Metcalfe's cancer returned in Emmerdale? | Metro News
thread.title_full: Has David Metcalfe's cancer returned in Emmerdale? | Metro News

author: Duncan Lindsay For Metro.Co.Uk
title: Has David Metcalfe's cancer returned in Emmerdale? | Metro News
text:
Duncan Lindsay for Metro.co.uk Monday 20 Feb 2017 7:22 pm (Picture: ITV) 
There are uncertain times ahead for David Metcalfe in Emmerdale in the wake of him discovering another lump on his testicle – is his cancer set to return? The unsettling discovery came after David tried to liven up his sex life with Tracy by dressing up – but as he approached her, she got a fright and accidentally hit him between the legs. 
When checking on the swelling, David was left scared to discover another lump but soon covered his fear when Jacob overheard him telling Tracy about it. 
As Jacob urged him to book an appointment immediately, David and Tracy assured him that it would be nothing. But as David prepares to visit the doctor, will he be given good or bad news? (Picture: ITV) 
Emmerdale are remaining tight lipped over whether David’s illness has returned for now but upcoming scenes will see the fear hit Jacob particularly hard as he worries for David’s future. 
Emmerdale continues on Tuesday 21st February at 7pm on ITV.
